# [Interview #301: Robert Jordan's Blog: Steady as she goes, Entry #7](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=301#7)

#### Wilson Grooms

Do keep the prayers coming. We're a long way from not needing them.

Wilson
  
Brother / Cousin
  
4th of 3
